oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Coggin Chevrolet, Nashville, Tennessee, circa 1960
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A view of the Coggin Chevrolet showroom and the parts and service building. This car dealership of new and used cars and trucks was located at Woodland Street at 2nd. The 1954 City Directory cites William E. Coggin, President, with the business address at 201-07 and 200-08 Woodland 6. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Coggin Chevrolet (Nashville, Tenn.)
